mapper.insert: insert into priority.priority_order_jan_replace select company_cd,priority_order_cd,jan_old,jan_new from priority.priority_order_jan_replace where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select jan_old as janOld,jan_new as janNew,"${janNameCol}" as janName from priority.priority_order_jan_replace jan left join ${tableName} mst on jan.jan_old = mst."${janCdCol}" where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
